name: The Young Ones? How Anarchic! Trivia Quiz | Television | 15 Questions

questions.text: What was the last line spoken at the end of the final episode?
questions.explanation:
'Phew! That was close!'.

	This was after the bus crashed through the big sign with Cliff Richard on it.

questions.text: Who were The Young Ones playing against on 'University Challenge'?
questions.explanation:
Footlights College, Oxbridge.

	Appearances on this episode include Mel Smith, Griff Rhys Jones, Emma Thompson and Motorhead.

questions.text: What sport do the lads enjoy a game of in the episode 'Summer Holiday'?
questions.explanation:
cricket & Cricket.

	'It would have been a six if you'd have killed him, Michael!'

questions.text: What car did Vyvian win in the cornflakes competition?
questions.explanation:
Ford Tippex.

	Yes, he won a Ford Tippex. He already owned a Ford Anglia.

questions.text: Whose underwear did Vyvian describe when trying to get the washing machine to open it's door in the episode 'Bambi'?
questions.explanation:
Felicity Kendal's.

	'Look what I have in my laundry bag. All of Felicity Kendal's underwear that needs a good wash!'

Nigel Planer & Planer.

	As of March 2002, Nigel Planer was last seen in 'The Grimleys'.

questions.text: Which of these people appeared in the series?
questions.explanation:
All of them.

	Robbie Coltrane played a one-eyed sailor, Lenny Henry played a postman and Terry Jones played a drunk vicar.

questions.text: What does Vyvian have written on the back of his denim jacket?
questions.explanation:
'Very Metal'.

	I always though it was strange that a punk should have 'Very Metal' on the back of a denim jacket.

questions.text: What type of creature is 'Special Patrol Group'?
questions.explanation:
Hamster.

	'I think Special Patrol Group is a stupid name for a hamster!'

questions.text: What is Neil's response when his parents ask 'Did you make your bed Neil'?
questions.explanation:
'No, I bought it'.

	Neil's mother was played by Peggy Thorpe-Bates.

Christopher Ryan.

	Christopher Ryan went on to play Dave Hedgehog in 'Bottom,' which was created by Rik Mayall and Ade Edmonson.

questions.text: Vyvian (Ade Edmondson) is married to which actress and comedienne who also appeared in the show?
questions.explanation:
Jennifer Saunders & Saunders.

	Dawn French and Lenny Henry, another married celebrity couple, also appeared on the show.

questions.text: What job does Neil take up in the episode 'Cash'?
questions.explanation:
Police Officer.

	'Open up, it's the pigs!'

questions.text: Alexei Sayle played the Bolowski family. Which of these is one of them?
questions.explanation:
Jerzy Bolowski.

	Although not one of The Young Ones, Alexei Sayle appeared in every episode, either in sketches or the full scenes.

Cliff Richard & Richard.

	How the lads ever got Cliff to do the theme tune I will never know. Thanks for taking my quiz.
